title: Grid Advanced
content:
# Container

:::note success
These work better when the container has a defined size
::: 





### Position Content Vertically

> - align-content

```sass
 /* Define Template Shorthand Rows/Columns */
        align-content: center;
```


### Position Content Horizontally

> - align-content

```sass
 /* Define Template Shorthand Rows/Columns */
        justify-content: center;
```

# Items

:::note success
Items strech inside their container by default, changing this removes the strech
::: 



### Position Items Horizontally

> - align-items

```sass
 /* Define Template Shorthand Rows/Columns */
        justify-items: center;
```



### Position Items Vertically

> - align-items

```sass
 /* Define Template Shorthand Rows/Columns */
        align-items: center;
```



# Particular Items

:::important success
Apply these inside the child containers
::: 


> - align-items

```sass
 /* Define Template Shorthand Rows/Columns */
        align-self: center;
```
